name: Space SHMUP (FloyDnt)
description:
• The player controls the spaceship. The ship is controlled by the keys: WASD. Shooting: SPACE.
  • The player's task: to hit enemy ships.
  • There are 4 types of enemies in the game.
  • When an enemy is destroyed, there is a chance to get 1 of 3 bonuses: shield, blaster upgrade, powerful blaster upgrade.

The source code of the project can be viewed here: https://github.com/FloyDnt/Space-SHMUP

Create by FloyD (Nikita Terlyukevich).
